title: Generate base seed for DataLoaderIter only if num workers larger than 0
body_html: This PR moves the generation of the workers base_seed such that it is only generated if data is fetched with workers, i.e, num_workers > 0. This allows to run for example a validation set without changing the random state und ensuring determinism in between to different experiments in which the number of validation times differs.
body_text: This PR moves the generation of the workers base_seed such that it is only generated if data is fetched with workers, i.e, num_workers > 0. This allows to run for example a validation set without changing the random state und ensuring determinism in between to different experiments in which the number of validation times differs.
body: This PR moves the generation of the workers `base_seed` such that it is only generated if data is fetched with workers, i.e, `num_workers > 0`. This allows to run for example a validation set without changing the random state und ensuring determinism in between to different experiments in which the number of validation times differs.
